comment: Adding a comment as myself to test email.

This recipe was a collab with Brad Basset. Used my old Gibbons meadowfoam honey that I had laying around as a [really dark](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/755835604025213113/1436330483633098886/IMG_0538.jpg?ex=69284301&is=6926f181&hm=807f6199e94cb52d10dc81e6c89a306d5455bc2afdaf1ec37857df2c42da2813) bochet. This will be aged in my Medium Plus Toast French Oak Bad Motivator barrel for as long as it takes (probably around a year).
I ***NEED*** to try this. What kind of barrel is it going in?
I love every iteration of this recipe, but blackberry **REALLY** works.
leaving a comment as someone else to test email functionality.
